hint: A bad workman always blames his tools
A barking dog never bites
A blessing in disguise
A drowning man will clutch at a straw

text: 어려울 때 있어주는 친구가 진정한 친구다
hint: A friend in need is a friend indeed
A guilty conscience needs no accuser
A journey of thousand miles begins with a single step
A leopard cannot change its spot

text: 집 안에서는 사자 집 밖에서는 쥐
hint: A lion at home, a mouse abroad
A miss is as good as a mile
A penny saved is a penny earned

text: 그림 한 장이 천 마디 말의 가치가 있다
hint: A picture is worth a thousand words
A rolling stone gathers no moss

text: 썩은 사과 하나가 한 통의 사과를 망친다
hint: A rotten apple spoils the barrel
A soft answer turns away wrath
A watched pot never boils
After a storm comes a calm
After death, the doctor
All Chiefs and No Indians
All is fair in love and war

text: 반짝이는 게 전부 금인 건 아니다
hint: All that glitters is not gold

text: 교수형을 당하려면 새끼 양보다는 다 자란 양을 훔치는 것이 낫다
hint: As well be hanged for a sheep as a lamb
Bad news travels fast
Beating up the dead horse
Be penny wise and pound foolish
Beggars cannot be choosers
Better late than never

text: 나중에 후회하기보다는 안전하게 하는 게 낫다
hint: Better safe than sorry
Better the devil you know than the devil you do not

text: 악마와 깊고 푸른 바다 사이에 있다
hint: Between the devil and the blue deep sea
Beware the fury of a patient man

text: 같은 깃털을 가진 새들끼리 무리를 짓는다
hint: Birds of a feather flock together
Blood is thicker than water
Cannot see the woods for the trees

text: 장갑 낀 고양이는 쥐를 못 잡는다
hint: Cat in gloves catches no mice

text: 맥주 살 돈밖에 없으면서 샴페인 애호가 노릇 한다
hint: Champagne taste on a beer budget
Child is father of the man
Constant dripping wears away the stone
Constant guest is never welcome
Courtesy costs nothing
Curiosity kills the cat
Cut off nose to spite face
Don’t bite the hand that feeds you

text: 아직 알에서 깨지 않은 병아리는 세지 마라
hint: Don’t count your chickens before they are hatched
Don’t cry over spilt milk
Don’t judge a book by its cover

text: 한 바구니에 가지고 있는 계란을 다 담지 마라
hint: Don’t put all of your eggs in one basket
Don’t rub salt in the wound
Draw water with a sieve

text: 고장 난 시계도 하루에 두 번은 맞는다
hint: Even a broken clock is right twice a day
Even Homer sometimes nods
Even a worm will turn
Every cloud has a silver lining
Every dog has his day
Every Jack has his Jill
Every rose has thorns
Fate works in a strange way
Fine feathers make fine birds
Folks never look under their nose

text: 한 번 속지 두 번 속냐
hint: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me
From hell to breakfast
Give the doctor a taste of his own medicine
Going south
Going west
Good medicine tastes bitter

text: 내일 먹으려고 아껴 두면 고양이가 먹어 버린다
hint: He who saves for tomorrow saves for the cat
Heaven helps those who help themselves
Herding cats, 통제 불가능한 일
Hunger is the best sauce
If that happens, I’ll eat my hat
If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it
If it walks like a duck, it quacks like a duck, it is a duck
If you cannot beat them, join them

text: 수중에 연장이 망치 밖에 없다면 모든 문제가 못처럼 보인다
hint: If your only tool is a hammer then every problem looks like a nail
Ignorance is bliss
I have my own fish to fry
Ill weeds grow apace
I’m not making a dime from it
It’s your funeral
Jack of all trades, and master of none
Juice is worth the squeeze
Laughter is the best medicine
Let the punishment fit the crime
Let the sleeping dog lie
Life is half spent before we know what it is
Like a cat on a hot brick
Like Sodom and Gomorrah
Lock the barn door after the horse is stolen
Look before you leap
Make hay while the sun shines
Money talks

text: 고양이 가죽을 벗기는 방법은 여러 가지다
hint: More than one way to skin a cat

text: 필요에 몰리면 안 할 수가 없다
hint: Needs must when the devil drives

text: 남자가 할 일에 꼬마를 보내지 마라
hint: Never send a boy to do a man’s job
No pain, no gain
No rest for the wicked
No roses without a thorn
No room to swing a cat

text: 한 사람의 쓰레기는 다른 사람에겐 소중할 수 있다
hint: One man’s trash is another man’s treasure
Out of sight, out of mind
Pie in the sky
Practice makes perfect
Red herring
Rome was not built in a day
Seeing is believing
Slow and steady wins the race
Speech is silver, silence is golden
Strike while the iron is hot
Stuck in the craw
Teaching grandma to suck eggs

text: 사과는 나무에서 먼 데 떨어지지 않는다
hint: The apple never falls far from the tree

text: 빵은 꼭 버터를 바른 쪽이 밑으로 해서 떨어진다
hint: The bread always falls buttered side down
The dead are soon forgotten
The early bird catches the worm

text: 잠자고 있던 사람의 그물에 고기가 잡힌다
hint: The net of the sleeper catches fish
The pen is mightier than the sword
The pot calls the kettle black
The squeaky wheel gets the grease

text: 낮말은 새가 듣고 밤말은 쥐가 듣는다
hint: The walls have ears
Time is the herald of truth
Touching the third rail
Too many cooks spoil the broth
Two can play the same game
Two heads are better than one

text: 악을 악으로 대한다고 선이 되지 않는다
hint: Two wrongs don’t make a right
Under the influence
Until hell freezes over
Water is wet
What is good for the goose is good for the gander
What goes around comes around
Whatever floats your boat
When in Rome, do as Romans
When there’s a smoke, there’s a fire
Where there is a will, there is a way
You can’t hold a candle to the sun
